events.message: I recently received my order, but the product arrived with several deep scratches and seems damaged. I am really disappointed because I was expecting a flawless item.
The system detected keywords related to physical damage and marked the case under Product Defect for further handling by the support team.
A customer support agent was assigned to this case to handle the complaint about the damaged product and coordinate a resolution.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. I’m here to help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any damage, along with your order number? That will help us expedite the process.
I’ve attached the pictures showing the scratches and damage. My order number is 123456789. I hope this issue can be fixed quickly.
Thank you for sending the photos. We can send you a replacement product immediately or offer a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you would like.
I would prefer a replacement, thanks. I really want the item as advertised, and the exchange sounds like the best solution.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 2 business days. We’ve sent you a tracking number by email. Thank you for your patience.
Hi, we’re checking in to ensure you received the replacement product and that it meets your expectations. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist with.
Yes, I received the replacement and it is perfect this time. Thank you very much for your prompt support and understanding.
We are glad to hear the replacement product arrived in excellent condition. We are closing this case now, but please reach out if you need any further assistance.
